subgoals.title: Set up user interface components for the Wordle game board.
Adding an initial key listener to detect letters the user enters.
Use regular expressions to determine whether a pressed key is a letter and, if so, save it.
Show the appropriate entered letters on the Wordle game board.
Select a Wordle answer at random from a list of potential words.
Change color of tile based on whether it is correct or present in solution word
